title: Eternal Glory
overview: Richard Bacon hosts this ITV entertainment series Eternal Glory where eight sporting legends will be put through their pacesThe sporting legends will be tested to the max and assessed for psychological endurance, reaction speed, agility, hand-eye coordination, strength, stamina, visualisation, strategy, adaptability, and recovery time.Full of personal stories, Eternal Glory follows the eight stars, of all ages and disciplines. All are prize-winners in their own sport, but how will they fare when pushed beyond their comfort zone? Each episode comprises of four tough physical or mental challenges. One athlete will go home in each episode, determined by the â€˜night duel' game. Finally only one will emerge triumphant and achieve Eternal Glory.
